google.title: Learn Spanish: Daily Readle
google.description:
Learn Spanish Daily with Real News & Stories. Teacher-Crafted. Student-Ready.

Readle is a Spanish language learning app with real-world news & stories. It is the world's first CEFR-graded reader to help you learn Spanish. Easily read & listen to news & stories anytime, anywhere – Take 10 minutes daily to learn Spanish and create a reading habit. Why should you learn Spanish with Readle? • Our language experts turn real-world news & stories into fun & bite-sized Spanish A1 – B2 Spanish learning courses tailored to your level. • Your best companion for reading, listening, comprehension & flashcard vocabulary training with thousands of story courses. Download Readle for FREE and start to learn Spanish the new way! ============== Learn languages with stories and be a part of the revolution: ► EFFECTIVE SPANISH LEARNING THROUGH IMMERSION Use our scientifically proven immersion method to learn Spanish effectively. Real-world stories & news curated by our language experts and turned into Spanish classes ranging from A1, A2, B1, and B2 levels. ► BITE-SIZED STORY LANGUAGE LEARNING COURSES +2000 interesting stories & news for you to learn Spanish. Readle allows you to learn them effectively in context, including grammar tips and vocabulary flashcard training. ► PERFECT PRONUNCIATION Listen to the story audio sentence by sentence. It will help you practice pronunciation and improve your listening skills. ► INSTANT DICTIONARY Quickly look up a word translation in every article with a tap on the word – the easiest way to learn vocabulary, phrases, verbs, and conjugation. Save your time switching between Reverso, Leo, Duden, or other Spanish dictionaries. ► GRAMMAR HELPER Spanish grammar helpers in each language learning course bring your grammar into action. Learn Spanish grammar quickly from the story context with real examples. ► VOCABULARY LIST & FLASHCARD Learn Spanish vocabulary or verb conjugation in the story courses. Use spaced repetition to study a word – a scientifically proven learning method to review and recall vocabulary at an optimal time. ► QUIZ FOR COMPREHENSION Test your reading comprehension and practice Spanish grammar, vocabulary, and articles (el & la) with quizzes in each story – a great way to challenge your Spanish language skills and prepare yourself for DELE, CELU, SIELE or other Spanish language learning exams. ► STORY LIBRARY & DAILY NEW STORIES 2000+ news & stories courses for you to learn Spanish in a wide range of topics that are available for language learning: - Travel - Culture - Food - Latest News - Transportation - Entertainment - Science and Medical - Technology - People - Parties Plus, many more – add on a daily basis! Readle is a must-have language-learning app for living and traveling in Spanish-speaking countries. Download Readle now and start to learn Spanish! Questions or comments about learning with Readle? Please email us at support@readle-app.org Privacy policy: https://readle-app.com/en/privacy-policy/ Terms of use: https://readle-app.com/en/terms-of-use/ Readle is the best companion for your language learning education & upcoming language learning tests to get ahead. Download Readle and start to learn Spanish!

reviews.review: geweldige app. leuke verhaaltjes, fijn om moeilijke woorden te leren. Instellingen voor notificaties zouden een fijne aanvulling zijn. verder geen verbeterpunten
